response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense significance to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship, innovation, and a story that I believe could enrich your life in ways that only a truly exceptional piece can.

Given its profound importance to me, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. I understand that the true value of such an item is subjective and deeply personal, but I trust that you will appreciate its worth beyond the monetary value.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require more information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 750000}
